review_data.content: E o primeiro restaurante que encontrei em Zurique que eles fazem dia do aniversário muito especial minha companheira fico então feliz

It is really the best Indian restaurant in Zurich, service was excellent, especially for us as tourists. But the real thing is the authentic Indian food, great taste and flavors, same as in India. Don't miss it.
Great food great service, i loved the butter chicken and malai kulfi All my friends enjoyed I would highly recommend this restaurant
Mi sono sentita per un momento in India, le ragazze vestite così splendide e così carine ,non dico del mangiare che quando penso ancora’ Aqua in Boca’
Wer hate eine gute tarmrind hill Restaurant Beautiful ambience , great service Will be back soon With my parents See u soon

The food quality is super the best, I could really say its the best in town specially the butter chicken. Place and the crew is so nice and such a friendly environment. Would recommend this to everyone!!
Freundlichste Bedienung die wir seit langem gesehen haben! Das Essen ist köstlich und das Ambiente trägt zum Charme des ganzen bei. Wohlfühlatmosphäre garantiert.

Es gibt viele gute Inder in Zürich, dieser hier sticht hervor - super liebevolle Deko und viel davon und alle im Service waren absolut freundlich und professionell. Unsere Online- Buchung war nicht ins Reservierungsbuch übertragen, doch hatten wir die Bestätigung und Reservierungserinnerung dabei, obwohl alles um 19:00 h schon voll war, wurde ein 2er-Tisch gefunden. Wir hatten die Mixed Starters für 2 und die waren super lecker und machen eigentlich schon satt. Garlic naan und onion-chili naan Waren sehr gut, auch der steamed Reis und natürlich die Hauptspeisen Chicken Tikka Masala und die Prawns Pak Pak - würzig, gar nicht sooo scharf.Ich habe einen salzigen Lassi zum Hauptgang bestellt, der wurde leider vergessen, was der Bedienung aber auffiel - nachdem das Essen gar nicht so scharf war und ich auch fast fertig, wollte ich ihn nicht mehr haben - das war auch kein Problem, die Küche hatte noch keinen zubereitet.Wir haben die Atmosphäre und das Essen absolut genossen.Das Publikum ist sehr gemischt, alt, jung, divers, international - ein totaler Mix, echt klasse.Eine unangenehme Situation hatten wir beim Bezahlen - wir gaben die landesüblichen 5% Trinkgeld und die vorher wirklich herzige Bedienung gab uns durch das Ignorieren desselben eindeutig zu verstehen, dass hier mehr erwartet wurde. Wenn natürlich das internationale Klientel die sonst in Europa gängigen 10 % oder gar die in den USA üblichen 20% Tip geben, dann war das klar enttäuschend… wir fanden es sehr unangenehm und fühlten uns nicht gut. Der Rest des Personals verabschiedete uns aber genau so herzlich, wie wir empfangen und bedient wurden. Ein kleiner Wermutstropfen, ansonsten wirklich top!
very good food, presentation and service! also very cool that you can have it with planted chicken. good vegetarian options

Wir waren zu Weihnachten im TamarindHill zum Abendessen. Die kurzfristige Reservierung via Website hat sehr gut funktioniert.Das Lokal war sehr schön dekoriert, man fühlte sich beinahe wie in Indien. Das Personal war sehr freundlich und trug sehr schöne indische Kleider. Das Essen war wie immer sehr lecker. Das Lokal war gut besucht.Alles war perfekt. Wir kommen gerne wieder.
We went there for Christmas We had a wonderful Christmas and a wonderful dinner. The food was amazing and we enjoyed every minute of it.
One of the best butter chicken I ever ate, well done and thank you to the chef. Very authentic food and the place is lovely.
Visited the restaurant for lunch. Great service, good food and the lunch menu was very reasonably priced. Look forward to returning one evening to try out their full menu.
Wir waren zum ersten Mal im Tamarind Hill und haben den Abend sehr genossen! Das Essen war sehr lecker und der Service sehr gut! Wir haben den nächsten Besuch bereits geplant.
I loved it! It reminded me of my trips to India: a very authentic flavour in a very cozy ambience. Very good food and service for a friendly price.

This restaurant is amazing! I have tried many Inidans in Zürich and this is one of the best! The staff was amazingly nice and the food as well as the plates presentation was just wow!We had an amazing evening with a fast service. I would definitely recommend it. The only small details (which applies to all Indian restaurants in Switzerland) is the fact that they’re very expensive. Nevertheless, the portions are big enough to do a takeaway.

The flavors and textures of the food are just phenomenal, and truly bring you back to India. Not to mention the nicest staff in town and the colorful design of the place.So nice to have a place with so many vegetarian and vegan options.We had a great time :)
Essen ist sehr lecker, Service ist freundlich und effizient, gute Präsentation vom Essen, Parking vor dem Restaurant ist ein Vorteil

Very friendly service and excellent tasty food prepared from a chef who knows the Indian cuisine inside out. This restaurant with it’s authentic but also experimental Indian dishes is one of the best in Zürich. It became a second home for us, whenever we want to have excellent food in a welcoming friendly atmosphere.
We go to the restaurant and order out quite often. Always love the quality of the food and the staff is amazing.
Nicht nur mega leckeres Essen, auch tolle Drinks! Wenn man Indien erleben will - muss man hierher gehen!
Das Personal ist immer noch super freundlich aber Leider haben die Qualität und der Geschmack der Menüs erheblich verschlechtert. War gerne da.
The food was delicious! The staff was welcoming and friendly. Great ambiance and Indian music. Overall great experience :)
Cibo ottimo,personale cordiale e disponibile ,atmosfera intima e curata. Consiglio di ordinare poco perché riempie molto. Bellissimi impiattamenti! Torneremo 👍🏻
the food was delicious! The staff is very friendly and i enjoyed my time at the beautiful bollywood style restaurant 10/10 would recommend👍🏼
Best Indian food in town. Nice atmosphere there and super friendly staff. The food was always perfect!
Öffnungszeiten sind leider falsch angeben! Montag ganztags geschlossen, der ganze Weg war leider für nichts

Immer nur Pizza essen? Nein. Hier bist du weit weg von diesem Gang ins Restaurant. Noch besser, nichts ist dir bekannt auf der Karte. Bereits die Namen der Speisen sagen dir nichts und plötzlich fragst du dich, wie man in Indien überhaupt isst.. nur mit den Händen oder alles auf dem Fladenbrot? Wie auch immer, egal wie Indien-Fitt du bist, das Personal lächelt durchgehend und überrascht dich mit ihren bunten Kleidern und exotischen Drinks . Hier isst du würzig und scharf. Schlag nicht zu früh viel rein denn beim Inder ist noch lange nicht fertig mit essen. La pancia Feedback:Essen überraschteService war stimmigDas Ambiente passte zum KochstyleDer Preis hat es verdientIch komme wieder
Buonissima cena, personale gentilissimo e competente. Il prezzo era onesto per quello che abbiamo mangiato.

As a family of six we visited twice in one week when on vacation in the area so we tried quite a few dishes and loved them. The thalis, the Goa fish curry and the chicken tikka salad were firm favourites. It is just a shame we couldn’t go every night and try every dish! There is a broader selection of drinks and desserts than in most Indian restaurants too.In addition the service was just lovely. Friendly, attentive and the staff were beautifully dressed to match the beautiful surroundings.One of our sons is disabled and he was made to feel as welcome as anyone else.If and when we are back in Zurich we will certainly visit again.Thank you for Ben’s mango lassis!
Beste indische Restaurant ever! Super freundliche Bedienung, sehr leckeres Essen, wir waren satt und zufrieden! Wirklich super feine Küche!

Ich war nun schon das dritte Mal hier. Es ist einfach nur perfekt. Vom Essen bis hin zum Service. Es besteht eine grosse Auswahl an indischen Gerichten. An die Einrichtung muss man sich allerdings gewöhnen.Alles in allem ein Erlebnis
Bester Inder. Sehr freundlicher Service. Sehr gutes Essen. Gute Auswahl an authentischer Küche. Schöne Plätze auf der Terasse.

I went there for lunch this week. Even with social distancing, the restaurant keeps its authentic vibe and aesthetic design. The interior is as amazing as ever and the food is delicious. I had one of the Thali dishes and it is both fulfilling (full meal, excellent value!) and tasty with every bite. Highly recommended!

Il locale è molto carino, ben arredata in uno stile tipicamente Indiano.Il prrsonale è molto cordiale, attento e pronto a dare consigli.Le pietanze sono ottime, sembra di essere in india. Io giro molto per lavoro e posso dire che in Europa è difficile trovare un locale di questa qualità.Il prezzo è corretto, sinceramente pensavo di pagare di più, abbiamo speso 70.- a testa.
It was a very nice surprise. Everything was perfect. Nice service, amazing food. I strongly recommend it.
It’s been redone to be more magical ! Impressed by the way it’s been detailed to take care of guests after the covid reopening - delicious food and excellent service
Egal ob Take-Away oder dort essen - es ist immer sehr lecker und die Bedienung extrem freundlich. Sehr zum empfehlen! Auch mal zum Mittagslunch.

My visit at Tamarind Hill was great. The food was amazing and in my opinion quite authentic as well as the atmosphere.The service I received was very friendly, everybody was working together to serve the food freshly and quickly.The food itself was very tasty and the spicy dishes I ordered were actually spicy, which I liked.One thing I’d like to highlight is the beautiful decoration on the starter plate! It was the mixed starters for 2 people and I’ve rarely seen such detailed and beautiful decorations at a “normal”, as in “not Michelin Star”, restaurant. Well done!All in all I’m giving 4 points as the food and service are great, but it comes with a price tag. But still Tamarind Hill in my opinion is a definite recommendation!

Das Tamarind Restaurant ist genau das Beispiel von einem durdachten Konzept. Hier stimmt einfach absolut ALLES! Das Personal engagiert und aufmerksam. Die Einrichtung so indisch kitschig - einfach wunderbar und die Küche - ja was soll ich sagen, wirklich so was von unschlagbar lecker. Die Preise passen auch.Wünsche diesem unschlagbaren Team, dass sie BITTE so weiter machen.Wir kommen wieder und machen tüchtig Werbung.
Ich finde diese restaurant beste!!!Superr service.Beste essen in diese Restaurant!!!Super decorationIch habe einfach keine worte mehr... Es ist beste Indisch Restaurant in ZURICHH!!!
Unser Familienessen war wieder spitze, danke!Zu Weihnachten auch noch herrlich kitschig dekoriert und dementsprechend lief auch die richtige Musik. Ich kann nichts negatives berichten.

This places serves Indian food every bit as tasty and authentic as you’ll get in India. It is spicy . . . But don’t confuse that with chili like heat that burns your mouth. Instead if you have never eaten Indian food, it is an explosion of taste and color and texture that your mouth has never experienced but, once you’ve had it, will long to experience again. Both the veg dishes and non veg dishes are just tops!
The service was amazing, the atmosphere was nice and the food was just amazing. You get the real indian experience. I can only tell everyone to try it out! I look forward to go there again!

The food was fabulous and the staff so attentive. We had a great night. Only complaint is that I couldn’t finish my meal!!! If you are looking for Indian food that is more than just swiss spicy - this is the place to go.
Love the food here .... beautiful restaurant ... great service .... will be back soon .... highly recommend

Ich hatte den Typ von einem Freund der sagte "ist einer der besten Inder in Zürich" und dem kann ich nur beipflichten..!Schöne Einrichtung, grosse Auswahl an Speisen, zuvorkommende Bedienung und super zubereitet.
What a beautiful setting.... I highly recommend the butter chicken and dal makhani .... also loved their house cocktail jaipur... would be back soon

In dem Restaurant läuft alles so wie man es sich vorstellt. Der Service ist extrem freundlich und zuvorkommend und macht gute Empfehlungen. Die Kleidung der Kellner ist auch schön anzusehen. Das Essen ist heiß, sieht frisch aus und schmeckt gut. Die Dekoration ist typisch Indisch und schafft ein angenehmes Ambiente. Alles in Allem sehr zu empfehlen.

Excellent service, warm hospitality, traditional Indian food, I truly recommend thali for two Mili Juli and their special aperitif Tamarind twisty, we were for our anniversary and we've had perfect decoration on the table ❤️
Everytime I come this restaurant never fails to impress me .love the food and always I look forward to their chefs special .my favourite is the rajasthani ragda... also compliments on the service
Eaten in many Indian restaurants but none hit the spot Tried their thalis ,it was amazing and the service super friendly Also really beautiful ambience,very well decorated
It was a decent enough buffet spread . The veggie starters were avg . Liked the ambiance and the location.

We made a reservation in this restaurant for our wedding anniversary. The moment I called their restaurant to reserve a table and mentioned that it is for our anniversary, I knew that it would be a great dining experience with them. The lady on the phone was very warm and kind. When we arrived at the restaurant, a lovely table with red petals of flowers was ready. Our table was situated next to a beautifully decorated wall with comfy seats. We were greeted warmly when we arrived. The food was absolutely amazing! My husband and I couldn’t finish them all so we brought the rest home. The entire restaurant has a very intricate and romantic design blending perfectly with a soothing Indian music. Before we could check out, we were given a free dessert and free two shots of their special drink. They also gave us vouchers which we can use the next time we come back. It really made us feel special during our day. I highly recommend this lovely restaurant. Thank you so much for such an amazing dining experience! We truly appreciate your hospitality.

I am a regular customer of this restraunt because according to me it has the best Indian food I have tried in Zurich with gr8 music and atmosphere .. friendly staff .. best presentation of dishes .. with a wide range of dishes and wines ..

Das Essen schmeckt mir sehr lecker. Das Essen war heißund lecker.Der Kellner war sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich..... vom eintreten in die Tür und vom mitarbeiter gegrüßt bringen, sitzend und getränkebestellung genommen, war 5 minuten entfernt. Ich finde das Restaurant sehr gut. Man muss gehen und besuchen.
Very Good And Tasty Food.. Friendly atmosphere and very well maintained. The cleanienss of the restaurant is also very good and lovely people. It was very nice visiting there
Amazing ambiance💫 Best Indian food you could ever get...everything was excellent and it was worth a visit....
The only place in Zurich which has the best food Keep it up 👍 I like the way they present their food and it’s really delicious

Me and my family had very great time in this restrauant best hospitality and great ambiance we ordered butter chicken and tandoori chicken Malai kofta and it was delicious as per my opinion this is the best Indian restaurant in Zurich
Very good restraunt .. excellent ambience .. friendly staff , the best part is the food which is awesome .. surely coming back .. I would recommend this Indian restraunt to everyone
Excellent authentic Indian kitchen. Nicely arranged and very friendly staff. A total gem that needs to be visited! Also the interior is very charming.

Appena entri resti impressionato dalla bellezza del locale. Un bar di altri tempi con delle lampade indiane in metallo dorato che scendono dal soffitto, parete con carta da parati, quadri indiani, foto indiane, lampadari in cristallo in tutta la sala e un grande lampadario che al centro del locale. Il locale non è molto grande e ci sono molti tavoli, ma l’ambiente è molto caldo e estremamente bello. Anche i camerieri sono vestiti con vestiti tipici indiani.Anche il locale prima del bagno è molto carino, con piccole candele elettriche, un divano, una maschera ad altezza d’uomo. Il bagno vero e proprio è decorato ma meno impressionante.Beviamo due tè freddi lichi e menta e zenzero e limone che sono molto buoni. Prendiamo dei samos di verdura che vengono serviti con una salsa al tamarindo. I samosa sono molto buoni e anche molto grandi e con un buon ripieno. Segue un pollo korma, sembrava pollo bollito e la salsa non aveva molto gusto, buono si, ma non speciale, non ricorda per nulla l’India e le sue spezie. Pesce al curry Goa molto buono e leggermente piccante. Contorno a parte: riso al limone, buono ma non speciale.

After a long tip in Europe, we were craving for Indian food. We decided to come here only due to its high ranking on TripAdvisor. Our decision proved to be correct.To start with we had a Chardonnay wine with Onion & Potato Fritters. In main course we had Veg Biryani and Dal Tadka. The food was very tasty and authentic.The restaurant had both indoor and outdoor sittings. Most of the guests preferred to sit outdoor since weather was very pleasant and surrounding very quiet. The decor was very good. We liked the ethnic Indian dress of stewardess. It looked classy. The service was very efficient and polite.No doubt it looked fine dining Indian restaurant !!
Worst service experience ever in a restaurant in Zürich!!! Food quality is average, but the service is terrible.

Mitarbeiter sprechen hier nur englisch, was eher ungewöhnlich ist. Alle sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Jederzeit aufmerksam und wünsche werden sofort erfüllt. Ich habe mir das Gericht Biryani mit Lamm angetan. Leider stand da nicht, dass das Gericht scharf ist und somit konnte ich bis zu einem gewissen Grad das Essen geniessen. So was muss stehen und nur wegen dem ziehe ich ein Punkt ab.Ansonsten sehr empfehlenswert.
Loved the food ,service ,ambience .....couldnt complain ....highly recommend the butterchicken and dal makhani....and also their home made icedteas...
It was an awesome Restaurant first of all.After i have to say they have a very good staff and clean service enjoyable food and very delicious i would suggest it to everyone

I am an Indian living in Switzerland for the past 2 years and have been looking for good Indian food everywhere. Finally I found Tamarind hill... The food was tasty and authentic, the best I have had so far. With just the right amount of spices, I felt as if I was back in India. The ambiance is comfortable yet luxurious. The service team was hospitable and friendly and the prices are very reasonable for the quality of food served. I would highly recommend Tamarind hill to anyone who would like to eat the most amazing and authentic food available.
Was there with a group of friends on Saturday night ....the place was packed but still got such an attentive service .the thalis were amazing. Will highly recommend

Food was OK...and probably better than many other Indian restaurants in Zurich Area,But these guys LACK HOSPITALITY and may such small things showed up when I visited with Swiss guests:Table was reserved by us but neither ready nor the staff know which one to assign.Special requests made at reservation were simply ignored.None of the staff spoke German.The polite explanations /advice on menu was missing....the stewardess were in a hurry and quite overtly trying to push you to "buy" more dishes...and then hope you eat and go out quickly so table is free for others.The interior-decor were garish and cheap and making photos on thee site look like an illusion.In Summary food wasn't bad....but the Hospitality you expect in a BIG city from a fine-dining restaurant was missing...smacked of desi-pettiness of a fast food restaurant.

Wow..found myself in Zurich, Switzerland tonite- craving Indian Food- Had Lamb Kebabs & wine.. Wine was good but the kebabs were incredible... Better than expected.. Great service Fantastic kebabs- better that I’ve had for a while- congratulations—-wish I’d taken a picture...

Last night we had the best time at dinner. Truly a great place to eat the best indian in the city.I reccomend the Butter Chicken.They have very positive and knowledgable service. Great atmosphere cheers ☆☆☆☆☆
We were very disappointed with quality of Indian food. Very expensive but worst food Services was not to the standard Will not recommend to anyone

Wir waren zu zweit am Abend essen. Als jemand mit indischer Abstammung, war ich erfreut als ich hörte, dass es einen guten Inder in Zürich gäbe. Leider stimmt dies nicht. Die Vorspeise war gut (Bhaji), der Hauptgang und das Dessert nicht. Auch wenn ich eine etwas mildere Würzung (westlich angehaucht) ok finde, war das Tandori Chicken weit vom orginal entfernt und schmeckte nicht besonders gut. Anna’s Best aus der Migro trifft es besser. Das Gulab jamen war auch sehr fad, und schmeckte nicht frisch. Der Mango Lassi fand ich auch nicht gut (schmeckte zu zuckrig und künstlich) Das ganze war auch nicht billig - 14 Fr für ein Aperol Spritz und Tandori Hauptgerichte von 30-40 Fr ohne Reis und Naan. Das kostet zusätzlich.Die Einrichtung war sehr schön, das Personal freundlich. Aber aufgrund der schlechten Preis/Leistung gibt einen weiteren Stern Abzug.

Das Essen war sehr authentisch Indisch und auch gut porioniert. Sehr schön angerichtet auf Platten und Teller. Die Bedienung ist sehr freundlich und zurückhaltend und ist auch hilfsbereit bei der Auswahl der Gerichte.

I went along with family on a Saturday evening. The restaurant is very near to tram stop. We were given a warm welcome. The set-up of the restaurant is like a dream sequence in a bollywood movie. The staff were excellent. The vegetarian food was really really good. I didn't expect such taste!One thing to consider. Google showed that the restaurant is open on Sunday till 230PM. We went there to find out they don't open till evening. Felt a bit let down. Please get that corrected.
I had the butter chikcken you should try it its fantastic thumbs up .тhe service was excellent and very warm

The menu variety and quality at Tamarind Hills was reasonably good, which is difficulty to find with Indian restaurants in Zurich. The best part was that they offered Thali, which was amazing value for me as solo visitor; as each dish is quite expensive to order. I could try variety of dishes and a dessert, by paying for a Thali. The other good Indian restaurant I visited, doesn't offer Thali / Buffet for dinner.Hospitality is good as the family members who perhaps own the restaurant, themselves serve the guest. They are very courteous and serve with a smile! Also very convenient to visit, as its right next to the tram stop. Overall a good experience!

Truly a special experience for us after a week of hiking in the Alps. Every dish had a unique flavor palette and was artfully presented. The decor was as vibrant as the food. We enjoyed the enthusiastic and attentive service. Favorite dishes: Lamb Naan, Butter Chicken, Chicken Tikka Masala, Vindaloo Lamb. A little off the beaten path but well worth the trip.
From the outside this is an unimposing venue but walking through the door it is very special - atmospheric decor, super friendly staff and tasty food. Definitely worth a visit.
Great indian food, great ambience, warm and smiling host. Thali offers a good variety of vegetarian options and tastes good.
Was in zurich for 4 nights and we ate here 3 times and 1 time in their other branch Fantastic is the word

We love Indian food and have a hard time finding good restaurants in Switzerland. Tamarind Hill was delicious and the service was impressive. Plus our clothes did not smell like Indian food. A bit pricey, to be excepted in Zurich, but not too expensive. A great evening meal.
The boss prepared a fabulous table for my son's birthday. Excellent food. Personnes adorables ! Thanks a lot to all of you.

As tourists in Zurich, we were surprised to find such a high-quality Indian restaurant in this part of Zurich (remote from the center). The decoration, the dishes, and the staff clothing created a very special atmosphere. The staff was very friendly and helpful. However, the real highlight was the food. Really tasty (although spacy -- it is an Indian restaurant …). We had a wonderful evening.
This really is a nice Indian restaurant, ideal for an easy evening with some very good (and spicy!) food. I will definitely come back!

Second time I have been to this restaurant. Decor is a bit kitsch, location is not special but the food is excellent! Dishes are very authentic. Reasonably priced. Staff are friendly. Good for a casual meal / not too formal.

I came with my boyfriend and parents.Enjoyed the palak ka phool as a starter and a variety of main courses. Goa fish curry and and bhindi masala really stood out.Enjoyed gulab jamun and kulfi at the end.Service was great :)Would definitely come again!
Went with my family and wow ,,,i was blown away,,, service was excellent ,food was delicious and beautiful ambiente Will highly recommendd And Will vê back soon
I'm very happy we stumbled upon this place with my family. We all love the restaurant as well as food we got served. I recommend this restaurant 100%

We were on our 1st trip to Switzerland and Zürich was our last stop on 8th day. After a week of eating other cuisines , we were craving badly for authentic Indian food / delicacies and googled places near our hotel.We decided to check out Tamarind hill as it was showing open till 10:30 in night and the time then was 9:30 pm so we had chances of making it .We reached the place and were greeted by staff dressed in Indian attire - so beautiful ! The setup was amazing and music played was so soothing and beautiful collection of Bollywood songs !We decided to order veg and non veg Thali to make it easy and quick and requested change of bread which was accommodatedWhen the food arrived, we were impressed by the thali set up - quite unique and when we had the first bite - it was absolutely mouth watering !Am glad we chose this placeWhenever in Zurich again, we would definitely visit this restaurant !

I am regular customer from the first week of this restaurant. More than food it was the hospitality and ambiance which struck most and we have been regular customer since. Not any more.Quality has gone down in all aspects - food, hospitality and experience.In the last visit, we had made a reservation - our food was delivered extremely late, on top of that they missed a main dish completely. We had ordered Chicken, paneer dishes and vegetable dishes incl. Okra - chicken was stale and poorly cooked, Okra were so hard and uncooked. Rest of the food was also nothing to boast about. Though starters were good. Even our complaint was ignored in the sense that it was acknowledged but with no action.I had really appreciated the brand which Akshay has built over the years. However last few experiences leave me with never to go back again.

We came on a Saturday evening and did have a reservation. The place was very busy and the food was fantastic. I highly recommend the paneer tandoori as well as the chicken tikka masala. The bowl of rice was small so we did order an extra. Terrific evening. Great atmosphere.

Da das Restaurant bei uns in der Nähe ist und es sehr viele sehr gute Bewertungen erhalten hatte,wurden wir neugierig und wollten es unbedingt ausprobieren. Unsere hohen Erwartungen wurden aber leider nicht ganz erfüllt. Es ist alles ok, aber das Essen ist deutlich zu teuer, vor allem wenn man es mit anderen gut bewerteten Restaurants in der Nähe vergleicht, zum Beispiel Rollis Steakhouse, Tibits oder Santa Lucia.Das indische Essen schmeckt jedoch gut, und es ist an unseren europäischen Geschmack angepasst. Das heisst zum Beispiel, dass es nicht sehr scharf ist. Die Bedienung ist freundlich und das ganze Ambiente ist orientalisch, indisch und insgesamt gut gelungen. Auf den schweren, dunklen Stühlen schwitzt man aber leider etwas, wenn man länger sitzt.Neben den hohen Preise bemängeln wir aber die Enge im Restaurant. Die Tische stehen sehr nah beieinander. Auch an der Bar steht man fast ein bisschen im Weg herum, wenn die Bedienung durchlaufen will. Vor allem am Wochenende gibt es eher lange Wartezeiten, da das Restaurant auch bei grösseren Reisegruppen beliebt ist.Wenn man die genannten Einschränkungen akzeptiert, dann lohnt sich der Besuch aber trotzdem. Wir waren inzwischen insgesamt zweimal dort.
Went there with family, unbelievable experience I received in this restaurant, love to visit again, for me it’s best in Zurich .. cheers!
The best butter chicken I ever had outside india. Beautiful ambience and super friendly service Will be back soon
Being from India we were not sure how would it end in Zurich going to an Indian restaurant Super host and delicious food.will definitely recommend
It's a restaurant offering best yummy variety of indian food with original indian taste in Zurich....best dinner ever
Food was good. But sad people. Didn't even smile. Sad face while serving. Earlier was good. Don't know what changed.

Eine tolle Überraschung in unserem Quartier. Eine sehr grosse Auswahl (auch glutenfrei) von indischen Gerichten, von mild bis sehr scharf. Sehr gut zubereitet und liebevoll präsentiert. Freundlicher und zuvorkommender Service, der mit einem Lächeln arbeitet. Interieur ist spannend umgesetzt - Indische Fotografien, passende Tapeten und loungige Einrichtung/Farbkompositionen. Auch die Musik mischt Lounge und indische Töne.Die Weinkarte ist sehr minimalistisch und überrascht kaum - aber für ein indisches Restaurant ist Rotwein sehr schwierig zu kombinieren. Bier passt wohl eher.Gutes Preis/Leistungsverhältnis am Abend, aber sicher nicht billig. Mittagsmenu hingegen ist sehr preiswert angepriesen.Grosse Portionen, aber "Doggie Bag" wird gleich beim Abräumen angeboten.

Excellent service, felt very welcomed here unlike the many other places where service was substandard. The food was good, especially the Lamb Rogan Josh and naan. Decor is a little over the top, but must keep in mind that India is probably very exotic to the locals. Lucked out by getting parking right outside the front door. BEWARE the huge bill at the end, for small portions (compared to the US).
After trying so many Indian restaurant my search finally ended .beautiful ambience and great food Highly recommended
Sehr guter Inder in Zürich. Service hat gepasst (sehr freundlich), Essen war hervorragend. Preis Leistung top. Kommen sicher wieder.

Wir waren zu 4 in diesem Restaurant und hatten zwischen 19:30 und 20:00 Uhr Reserviert. Wir waren um 19:40 dort angekommen und freuten uns riesig auf das Essen. Am Anfang war eigentlich alles in Ordnung der Tisch war noch nicht ganz ready und einer von uns hatte zuerst keinen Stuhl war aber völlig okay.Wir hatten beim Service 2 mal eine Vorspeise bestellt und für alle 4 einen Hauptgang. Die Vorspeise war direkt nach 5-10min bei uns (sehr zügig). Der Hauptgang war zirka um 21:15 bei uns also ungefähr 50-60min nach der Vorspeise. Die Krönung war das wir nicht informiert wurden ob es länger geht. Wir haben dann noch bemerkt das bei unseren Hauptgang (Butter Chicken) die Beilage fehlt. Nach einer 2 Bestellung haben wir den dan auch bekommen. Leider war dies für uns nicht ganz nachvollziehbar warum ein Hauptgericht 34.- kostet fast 1h Zubereitung braucht und dann der Reis für 4.5.- nochmals nachbezahlt werden müsste.What ever ...Preis-Leistung stimmt überhaupt nicht. Wir waren fast alle mit dem Essen zufrieden auch die Menge in einem Gericht war okay jedoch war dies alles viel zu hoch im Preis und wir haben auch keine lust mehr solange auf unser Essen zu warten.Der Tisch neben uns hatte für diese Warterrei eine Entschuldigung bekommen auf diese warte ich übrigens immer noch...Es gab Gäste die waren später an einem Tisch und waren vorher mit dem Essen fertig bevor wir überhaupt angefangen geschweige unser Essen bekommen haben...Lieber wo anders falls Ihr die Wahl habt. :)

First thing on my return to zurich me and my family wanted to do was book Tamarind hill for dinner and I was lucky to get a reservation on a Saturday night - I had to wait though but don’t mind as the owner is very generous to offer a complimentary round of drinks while we were waiting.Tamarind Hill is a Cut above your average Indian curry house. They serve modern Indian food in a beautifully decorated Dinning room. So far the BEST INDIAN RESTAURANT in Zurich. Guys keep up the good work . Top Class service , gorgeous food and amazing decor.Ps. Love your staff uniforms - such a attention to detail . See you very soon . Highly recommend this restaurant and heard they have opened a new branch , must try that on my next visit.5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
I‘ve been twice already in this restaurant and im Very pleased how authentic Indian it is. From the greeting, atmosphere, the food, drinks.. My colleague was really happy also..
Amazing food ,being an indian i can say that i have never had such delicious food in europe while travelling .... the staff were wonderful and were dressed so well Will visit again on my next visit

Been to many indian restaurants in zurich , but was always disappointedCame across tamarind hill by accidentFirstly amazing ambience , fantastic and friendly service and the best indian food i had in zurichI had the thali ans was super impressed by the uniqness of presntation and the food was deliciosWe were a group of 9 people and everyone was raving about the foodWill definitely highly recommend
The food was absolutely delicious! Everything from the main dish to the naan bread- would totally recommend this place to any indian food lover.

Sadly went from one of the best to average with a much larger now bog standard menu and ridiculous rate just for a jug of tap water with some fruit in. It's a shame really liked it but now after last visit would not return. Such a shame given there are so few good restaurants in Zurich and even less good Indian.

We visited the Tamarind Hill last Friday with friends and the whole Indian experience was amazing. They have a large choice of authentic Indian dishes to enjoy. The service was warm and friendly and the staff really know how to make you welcome. We will definitely return!!

I visited at this place with my girlfriend!! I made a reservation and the way I was treated by the servers was the best!! I loved the Malai kofta and butter chicken ... Made me feel homesick !!! Have to get some more of it

la cena era fantastica, preparata con molto amore per i dettagli. Bravi! i antipasti erano molto gustosi anche se un poco piccoli. i drinks sono buonissimi e abbondanti. il personale molto gentile e con stile.
Einfach toll! Super Essen von mild bis sehr scharf! Ein absolutes Muss ist zum Dessert ein Malai KulfiMan fühlt sich wie in den Ferien. Das Personal ist immer freundlich und zuvorkommend!

Jeder will immer lecker essen aber im TamarindHill bekommt man noch eine tolle Show geboten!!!! Das Essen war soooo lecker! Und der Service ist hervorragend. Das einzige was genervt hat, ist dass man nach rund 90min den Tisch räumen muss -,.

Not a good restaurant if you are a vegetarian. The curry (palak paneer or spinach with cottage cheese) was smelly and not fresh and upon bringing this to staff’s attention, their attitude was very defensive and casual.Being travelled to many different countries and various Indian restaurants was quite amazed to see this restaurant puts yellow bengal gram daal (chole dal) instead of red kidney bean (rajma) in dal makhani (black lentil dal) which was not even cooked properly.Lastly they seated us on a table which was in a cramped space while the tables next to us were are all empty all the time we were there.

We went for dinner on eve of Christmas. The lentil soup was outstanding. Yellow dhal and aloo matter were out of the world. Service was superb. Raita is a must. Also if you wish to save money go for the thali which is just 34 francs. The owner is Indian and is very helpful. One of the best meals I have in Europe. Planning to go again today.
The interior and decor is very interesting. There are quite a range to choose from including vegetarian dishes. Best experience one can get from a Indian restaurant in Zurich.
The Christmas decoration is like a fairy tale and the service is awesome.. very friendly and smiley.. I love this restaurant
Das Restaurant hat sehr gute Atmosphäre und Fantasie Essen, gute Service , empfehle ich alle.Der Chef hat oft lecker Dersert uns geschickt.
Great ambience, excellent service and amazing food. Tge restaurant was packed even on a tuesday night so it says all . Highly recommend

Beautifully decorated for Christmas and once again amazing food .Every time we come here we are always surprised by their innovative menu .We tried their special Christmas platter and for the main we tried the duck madras and paneer tak a tak . It was very deliciousCan’t wait to be back .

I probably had too much expectations from an Indian restaurant in Switzerland but unfortunately the experience at tamarind hill has not been the greatest.Everything started from the place atmosphere: there were xmas decorations and songs, which is not exactly what you would look for when going to an ethnic restaurant. The waiter was very kind but also inexperienced: wrong orders, some others forgotten, and other details that distinguish a poor from an excellent service.The food was good but also not wow, and for the high price of the courses, I found the portions quite small.Considering all the good reviews, I hope I was just unlucky and got a bad day.
I enjoyed so much this place! great staff, all dressed up in traditional clothes; and the food was so great.. Thanks you really made my day.
Tolles Essen, super Personal - einfach ein Traum! Unser Lieblings Restaurant, ein Garant für Qualität! Danke!

We are weekly guests and would drive miles for its food! I like the charming staff as much as their food. Honestly, this is one of our few restaurants we drop in regularly... I like they dont use MSG st all... Great Work!
Loved the Food and the Service. Nice and cosy place. Very hospitable. Pampered just like home. Thank you.

Ambiente sehr schön, essen war solide, Fleisch etwas zäh, der Hammer kam zum Schluss. Nach 1 1/2 Stunden wurden wir (4 Personen, vorgängig reserviert) aufgefordert den Tisch frei zu geben, wir könnten noch an der Bar einen Drink nehmen. Ber der Reservation weder beim Betreten des Restaurants war ersichtlich, dass die Tische mehrmals vergeben werden (auch dann fände ich 1 1/2 Stunden zu wenig). In das Restaurant gehe ich nie mehr

I always try and find an Indian Restaurant wherever I go in the world. This place was amazing! I had the chana masala and it was very flavorful. The samosas were good as well. If ever in Switzerland stake this place out. The waiters/owners are very friendly as well!
Das Essen ist super,schmeckt ausgezeichnet.Man wird sehr freundlich bedient. Top Service. Kann man nur weiterempfehlen.
Fresh food and very healthy also .. Very fast service and nice people !! The best & the most clean Indian restaurant ..
I loved it the minute I entered the restaurant. Amazing food and excellent service Highly recommend the place
Der Service war freundlich und das Essen sehr lecker. Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis stimmt auch. Wir kommen wieder.

I visited with my husband to celebrate our aniversary.. We tried chicken and shrip thali... Well deserved resturant, best thali, amazing presentation with delicious food and good staff.. I would highly recommand this place... Defi we will b back...

I was on a pleasure trip with my family, hunting for Indian food from 6 days and we found this magical place Tamarind hill in Zurich... Their Tka tak Prawns is for die for with Pulao Rice, staff was so nice and humble Great serviceoverall excellentwe will come back for surethank you

We were 8 of us, my friend had a bday thanks to tamarind hill for such a lovely surprise arranged for him it’s really Awesome to find such an authentic Indian restaurant in Zurich, good food with excellent service it was like cherry on cake.

wir waren 10.11.18 um 18.00 in diesem restaurant. wir hatten für 18.30 reserviert. wir konnten direkt an den tisch. wir bestellten, die vorspeise kam schnell, die hauptspeise direkt danach. da es für ein geburtstag war hatten wir ein kuchen mitgebracht, der auch unmittelbar nach der hauptspeise serviert wurde.das essen war gut. weder aussergewöhnlich schlecht noch unglaublich gut.um 20.00 kam dann eine mitarbeiterin auf uns zu und sagte, dass wir bitte unser tisch freigeben sollen, da andere leute warten.(wir haben online reserviert, es war nirgendwo erwähnt, dass die reservierung zeitlich begrenzt war. im normalfall sind es 2h, da wir um 1830 reserviert hatten wäre dies dann um 2030, und nicht 2000 gewesen.) wir waren zunächst etwas geschockt, fragten jedoch noch nach einem kaffee und der rechnung. sie sagte es sei in ordnung, obwir bitte den kaffee an der bar (die voll war) nehmen können. wir verneinten.wir haben für rund chf 525.00 konsumiert. ich finde dies eine unverschämtheit. wir haben als entschädigung eine flasche wein (gemass google chf 17.00) erhalten.ich muss ehrlich sagen, ich bin enttäuscht. es war nicht mein erster, jedoch sicherlich letzter besuch hier.

War bereits zum zweiten Mal hier und wurde auch beim zweiten Mal nicht enttäuscht. Die Bedienung ist sehr nett und das Essen sehr fein. Wir hatten (2 Pers.) den gemischten Vorspeiseteller und jeweils noch ein Hauptgericht und dies war uns dann doch zu viel, sodass wir die Speisen mitnahmen und diese dann am nächsten Tag noch geniessen konnten. Leider war das Essen für uns dieses Mal eine Spur zu scharf aber scharf erwartet man in einem indischen Restaurant.Aber von der Atmosphäre und der Gastfreundschaft ist dies wirklich ein super gutes und sehr schönes Restaurant, wo ich sehr empfehlen kann.
'Real' Indian food. Items you are unlikely to find at our India restaurants. Great service. No corners cut. Slightly expensive but worth it.
Its one of the better Indian restaurants I have tried in Zürich. I have already been twice there. The ambiance is also quite good.

It was my first time in Tamarind Hill with my family last Wednesday. The services, food recommendations, drinks, taste of food, desert was excellent and attractive. Service guy named Raj; is very attentive, polite and smart. He recommended us for thali which was smecked Sehr Gut. Vielen dank tamarind hill & raj to made our Halloween day.
In der Schweiz noch nie so gut indisch gegessen! Mango-Minz-Suppe, Kartoffelküchlein & Garlic-Naan waren fantastisch! Wir werden wieder kommen...

Amazing food, amazing people. This restaurant is a pleasure to be. I was there in my last pregnancy week. I had this amazing curry food because I wanted to start labor as soon as possible. Turns out me and my husband had an amazing time together with delicious food and friendly staff.

Ich war nun zweimal im Tamarind Hill und gehensehr sehr gerne wieder hin.Die Gastgeber sind sehe zuvorkommend und freundlich - und dass man englisch spricht trägt für mich erst recht zum Charme des Hauses bei.Das Ambiente die Dekoration - so stell ich mir Indien vor!Und dann das Essen Wahnsinn. Für das Dessert hat‘s nicht mehr gelangt, da alles andere so lecker war. Aber vom hauseigenen Tee über die phantastische Dal-Suppe bis hin zu den Apetizern und den Hauptgängen - es liess keine Wünsche offen!Ich freue mich schon auf den nächsten Besuch im Tamarind HillThanks to everybody - I‘m loocking forward to coming back soon.

Wir hatten den Spontanen drang auf Indisch umd sind deshalb hier eingekehrt.Das Essen war ausgezeichnet, die Dame im Service sehr kompetent. Sie hat unsere Wünsche erfasst und das Passende Gericht empfohlen. Serviert wurde auch speditiv, nur das Dessert dauerte etwas länger... Hauptgang 20min, Dessert 30min. Das Warten hat sich gelohnt, die Desserts waren auch sehr lecker. 4 Personen 200 ohne Wein. Waren nicht das letzte mal da. Parkieren direkt vor dem Lokal gefällt mir auch sehr.
Tried one day visiting this restaurant, food was really good with exotic flavours. Many options to explore and each item has its own taste. A must try place in Zurich. Good food. Nice ambience.
We tried veg food and it was really good. Starters were good. And the Indian Sabji dishes were really awesome. Great taste. I would say this is probably the best Indian food restaurant in Zurich.

Visited this restaurant with 5 of my friends for dinner. Must say it serves the best Indian food I’ve had in Switzerland.... the restaurant also has a very nice and comfortable seating which I really liked.The service of staff was extremely courteous and friendly and they recommended us the dishes as per our likings.But the biggest plus point was their food... will definitely recommend this place for best food and service.
If you eat through your eyes first and also crave for good flavors,this is a great place to go. The food has done great choices and bring the authenticity of Indian culture fused with the modern era.
Great food, wonderful people. I'm highly "problematic" with food and stayed at Zurich for 20 days, and ate there daily. Couldn't find a better place.
Great culinary experience, excellent service, calm and comfortable. Right amount of spices. Probably the best in Zurich.

We'd been to Tamarind Hill in 2017 and enjoyed Thalis outside. I wrote a glowing review then and we went back with that memory in mind. Our server back then was great.This time we had the mixed appetizer starter, butter chicken, and saag paneer. They were really surprising bad (all of them). The appetizer plate was shockingly unfresh, with wilted veg on the plate and some things fried in what tasted like old oil. The tandoori chicken pieces on it were far too fatty, poor quality meat. The butter chicken tasted just mediocre and a bit too sweet. The saag paneer was ok, nothing special. The dishes should have been special because they cost over 30 francs each! It was disgraceful.The service was okay, but they were pacing throughout the restaurant, chatting loudly with each other, etc. distracting from the atmosphere in a way that I've never seen in a restaurant.We will not ever be going back here and would warn people against going out of the way for this. Too bad the service and food have gone very much downhill. The décor is lovely.
Another great night and i loved the lamb roganjosh and not to forget the great service we got ....will be back soon again....thanks saira

This restaurant offered an authentic fare with an incredibly tasty menu. The service delivered by Jess was nothing short of exceptional. He is passionate, knowledgeable and resourceful. Thank you for a wonderful experience

One of the few restaurants open on a Sunday. The food was authentic, tasty and a wide variety of veg and non veg options! Top notch service and great ambiance. I would definitely recommend this restaurant if you are looking for a good meal and good indian food in Zurich! I will certainly visit this place again!

We arrived on a Sunday evening, no reservations but were quickly seated. Excellent wait staff had good recommendations for both drinks and dinner. Wife and I had the Thani dishes, one vegetarian and one lamb. The multiple small dishes added up to a lot of food. Each dish was distinct, flavorful, perfectly spiced. Lamb was very tender; vegetables were lightly cooked and not overdone. Excellent Nan bread was also soft, warm, and great for soaking up juices. CH $80 for our combined dinners with drinks for 2. Will come here again.
مطعم اكله لذيذ أنصح به والكمية كافيةلكن انتبه للفاتورةقد تجد زيادة من دون ان تعلميستحق الزيارة ...٠
Really amazing food , lamb tandoori to die for and to top it off I would say the most friendly staff I ever experienced. Beautiful ambience .try their homemade iced teas

Wir waren etwas überrascht über den hohen Preis für ein vegetarisches Thali. Leider war das Essen, vor allem für den Preis, enttäuschend. Macht vegetarisches Essen attraktiver und reduziert den Preis!

Well, they have worled on improvimg amd renovating the interiors but the food dint impress us to be honest. We ordered butter chicken and dal makhani amd both had way too much curry and less dal/chicken. We asked to make the food less spicy but again it turned out way too spicy.Having said that, we ordered home delivery once and all veg optioms in the veg thali were really good.Staff is good as well.

Hallo ZusammenWir Paar aus Region AG&ZH, waren heute erneut da. Jetzt musste ich aber das los werden, nach soviel besuchen bei Euch;IHR SEID DER WAHNSINN!!!!Top Service:+nach mehr brot gefragt, sofort bekommen+super Wein empfehlung+Vegetarisch für meine Partnerin, Super!+Herzlicher Gastgeber und SEHR zuvorkommend!Wir können euch das Lokal nur empfhelen und Ihr werdet eine unvergesslich Zeit haben.Grüssr

If you’re ever in Zurich, you must visit this place for some amazing authentic Indian food! My friend and I ordered the lamb thali and the spicy shrimp thali with mango lassi. The customer service was great, the waitress was polite and knew the menu well. The restaurant is well designed, with great interiors and a nice terrasse as well if guests want to enjoy the sun outside. Overall, a must visit place

We googled this place in Zurich as we were craving for Indian food and we were pleasantly surprised. We ordered a combination of vegetarian and non-vegetarian food - all the items were delicious, authentic in terms of Indian taste, and the quantity was appropriate. The interior of the restaurant is a fine blend of modernity and traditional Indian decor. Whether you are going there for a casual drink with Indian snacks or looking for a sumptuous Indian meal, you would not be disappointed.The restaurant is a bit pricey; however, you may not mind paying higher for the reasons above!

Decent decor, ambiance and service but the food lacked some authentic Indian spices and flavors. The wine served was too warm as they apparently don’t keep the reds in cellar. It seems to be an overrated restaurant that’s catching up with it’s generous and perhaps misleading reviews. Nevertheless I’d say it’s worth a try as my expectations were too high spotting them trending # 1 in Indian food on TripAdvisor.
Wir haben das Essen sehr genossen. Das Butter Chicken ist eine Wonne. Wenn es indisch sein soll, dann ist das Tamarind die erste Wahl.

This restaurant is a mini-India in the heart of Zurich.Staring from their decor, their interiors, the uniforms of teh attendants to their food, everything is so India-nised that I instantly fell in love with this one.Their food is awesome, a real treat for your taste buds.You must try the thali they offer.Among the 5days stay in Zurich, we visited this restro thrice.A wonderful experience indeed!!
Best place to visit😍😍 The food is so yummy😋 I liked the service and decorations and there is so friendly environment. The best restaurant in zurich😍😍

It’s an amazing Indian restaurant💕💕The food is so delicious😋😋I was being greeted by the staff🌹👌🏻 Very friendly environment😇🌍 It is the best restaurant in the Zürich🇨🇭I would definitely like to visit again here( Its like a home to u)
Was there with family. We are a mix of vegan and no-onion-garlic folks. They accommodated all requests. Super nice and excellent food also.
Delicious indian food with lots of options. Served by warm, welcoming staff. Will definitely visit again!
It is definitely the best in Zurich . Amazing food , we tried the lamb tandoori and methi Matar malai. The breads were very tender . Special compliments on the service , very friendly service
Speisen sehr gut, etwas lange Wartezeit, Service OK, Restaurant jedoch etwas eng und lärmig, Ambiente/Dekoration so-la-la. Reservation ist empfohlen.

This place is one of the best Indian restaurants in Zurich. Not only in terms of taste but also the atmosphere. They put a lot of attention to detail, it's more than just good food eating there is a very pleasant experience always.

The food was delicious! We were happy to find this Indian restaurant in Oerlikon, Zurich. When we arrived at 18:30, the restaurant was half full already. Many Indians, must be authentic. My two young children enjoyed the meal too. Staff was very friendly too
A must try restaurant in Zurich featuring indian cuisines... exceptional Service and the house specials are to die for.. 😋😊

Sehr netter Empfang und die Einrichtung sieht super originell aus. Leider sprechen nur vereinzelt Mitarbeiter deutsch, aber was soll’s, ist kein Drama. Freundliche waren die Mitarbeiterinnen alle mal. Ich hab mir als Vorspeise Aloo Tikki (Kartoffelküchlein leicht scharf) angetan. Als Hauptspeise habe ich Lamb Raganjosh (zartes Lamm mit leicht gewürziger Sauce) genossen. Kulfi Pistazien als Dessert sehr ungewöhnlich, aber muss ja nicht alles süss sein. Ein gelungener Abend, obwohl ich am Anfang sehr skeptisch war. Preise sind relativ hoch, aber man muss sich auch mal was gönnen.

The best malai kofta and dal makhaniAfter traveling for 10 days in Europe and being pure vegetarian s we ate mostly in Indian restaurants. I must say tamarind hill was a breath of fresh air.Very delicious food and very accommodating staff . The lady was so kind to our children.i wish we had this same place in our town .

Excellent food and service Very good food and the naans are to die for . The place is very nicely decorated and the service is excellent. Maria in particular was very nice and was very helpful.we will be back .
The food was very tasty and well presented. The awards as best restaurant in town are well deserved.

If you love to share your food this isn't your place. We were a big table (six adults plus three children) and I ordered lamb thali plus a starter to share with my partner. The other people ordered their food according to their wish and everyone got their individual drinks (even the kids). Then, I was told in a very impolite way that according to the restaurant policy I wasn't allow to share my food, though that kind of non sense rule was written nowhere, not even on the menu. The waitress, who unfortunately ended up to be the owner, was forcing us to take as much food as possible, saying: "you have ordered too little food... you have to take Naan and this and that". Yes, you will be unable to eat all that food so, she can throw it away (or maybe reuse it) and take your money for something you didn't want to order. The food wasn't great either... not authentic Indian food, tasteless and without love. All in all: poor quality food, horrible service and a non sense policy about not to share food (in an Indian restaurant)!!! Also, the location wasn't in a good neighbourhood, in front of abandoned buildings with grafittis.

Decoration is nice but food way below "good". It seems to me that many ratings are fake for this place as Malabar in Oerlikon is better but has lower rating.Taste of biryani not even close to biryani. Meat without any taste. Chicken Tikka Masala tasting of bacon or smoke flavour and it ends there. Can that be called Chicken Tikka Masala?

Bester Inder, ever! In Zürich und auch sonst... innovativ, kreativ, stilvoll, top Bedienung, total leckeres Essen, sehr grosse Auswahl. zu Recht auf Platz 1 als bester Inder der Stadt. I'll come back!

The service and the decor excellent, but there ends the excellence. Horrible food. I am a vegetarian and this is the worst food ever. I was misled by so many good reviews and gave it a try. We were a family of six and everybody was disappointed with the food. Maybe we went with so much expectations after reading the reviews. We are from USA and the Indian restaurants in USA offer much better cuisine. Avoid at all costs.
Not the first time I’ve been here, and definitely won’t be the last...chicken Tak a Tak is awesome...if your in Zurich be sure to try this place
one of the good restaurant serving indian food, the Waiters are extremely polite and helpful and serving with a smile. Nice experience , Thali is a good option for a big eater
Food was excellent. Service was too. I will say it was very pricey. Family of four sharing two mains and one children's meal plus naan and soup was $170. Ouch but we'd go back!
Staff are lovely, I'm not used to Indian food but everything was explained to me and it was all delicious (especially the bread). Will definitely come again!

I was there for the second time after 6 months almost... it was once again an amazing experienceI loved the malai kofta and the dal makhaniMust compliment them on the ambience .... it was a tuesday night but it was packed .Whenever i am in zurich i make it a point to visit this amazing restaurant!!!
La mejor comida India, muy buen servicio, presentación, sabor y sobre todo te sientes como en casa =)
It is a very good indian restaurant.The food is lip smacking and Mr.Raj is very polite and humble. He serves food according to your wish and is a very good human being
I am really enjoyed my meals and excellent service staff are very kind. Very nice atmosphere and clean restaurant.

Prominently located and very well appointed Indian Restaurant , run expertly and with finesse by Akshay.Very good and delicious vegetarian thali, fabulous presentation, sumptuous content to invigorate the tastebuds and the ever indulgent host. Very strongly recommend all desis to put it on the "must visit" list on the Swiss Tour.

I went with 5 colleagues after work. I personally avoid Indian restaurants - this is because as an Indian myself I find the food in Indian restaurants in Europe almost always disappointing. But Tamarind Hill was a nice surprise. The vegetarian starter platter, the parathas and the raitha and butter chicken were all great. All washed down with Kingfisher beer!
The place is tastefully furnished and gives a cozy ambience. The staff are friendly and the north Indian food is very tasty. Overall value for money!
I normally take food from here it has great food with taste and great service always offer. The ambiance is good ..... I really enjoying have food here

We went to this place on our last day in Switzerland and had a very tasty North Indian fare for supper. The dishes like Samosa and biryani were authentic and well presented. The staff are efficient and quite warm. The quantity of each serving was good enough for two people and the taste of the food was authentic and quite well prepared. The food was served hot which is how it should be. QUite near a tram station and has seating outside as well which was enjoyable in June. Prices though were quite steep for somebody travelling from India but I suppose it is benchmarked against Zurich cost of living. But overall a great treat.

Hier stimmt eigentlich alles; Sehr leckeres Essen, schön angerichtet, 1a Service, sauber und interessant eingerichtet. Dafür bezahle ich auch gerne etwas mehr. Werde in Zukunft sicher öfters gehen. Schön, dass es in Zürich noch solche Restaurants gibt.
Prices reasonable, you get a lot of food! Huge menu and everything we had was delicious! Friendly staff and great atmosphere.
Ich war bereits zum zweiten Mal im Tamarind Hill und war auch dieses Mal begeistert!! Der Service ist sehr aufmerksam, die Speisekarte nicht 0815 und das Essen hervorragend. Immer wieder gerne :)

A great homely place with a wonderful ambience. They serve free water which is a kind gesture . Quantities of servings was more than double compared to 4 other indian restaurants we went to. Food has authentic taste and the indian breads were very nicely cooked. Staff is very hospitable and the menu has a large variety. They also serve free papad and onions which is also a very nice gesture :)
The food is like eating in India. The best dal makhani and Malai kofta I had outside India. Excellent customer service and beautifully decorated
Nice place Good food Excellent thalia Worth service Great place to visit Will come back soon Highly recommended
Very nice restaurant good ambiance Service excellent sarah Great food Will visit soon Over all excellent
Very nice service Bday celebrated very nice Nice thali Best resturant in town Ask for saira Willvisit again :)

excellent service , beautiful ambience and the best lamb bhuna i ever had. my partner had the chicken kashmiri....and was delicious recommend to make a reservation... was extremely busy on a tuesday night
Best Indian in Town!!! Very authentic cuisine. Nice Terrace to sit outside. Very friendly staff and great decoration. Parking available
There are a Lot of Indische Restaurant in Zürich, but Tamarind Hill are a very special one!!!!! Food Service Place are just Amazing.

For reference, I am Indian and this place really surprised me with their quality and taste. The food was absolutely delicious, served by courteous and friendly staff and a great variety in the menu. 2 thumbs up, will definitely return every time I visit Zurich.

It’s a pity that I waited for so long to try this place . I was highly recommended this place with quiet a few Indian colleagues of mine but we finally got a chance to try it outVery impressed with a warm welcome even though the place was buzzing . We did not make a reservation but we were offered a glass of prosecco while we waited for a tableThe food was amazing . We tried the chicken tikka for the starter and then for the main we ordered the Thalis.We will be back soon

Tried their most popular dishes butter chicken and lamb roganjosh... and they both were mind blowing... the naan were perfectly cooked and I must compliment the girl serving us .She was all smiles and very politeAlso recommend to try the tandoori pineapple for dessert.

After reading the reviews we were looking forward to visit this place as Indian restaurants are few in Zurich and most serve food which is certainly below par. We ordered two small beers , samosa as a starter , Lamb roganjosh , naan and tandoori Chicken leg . The entire meal costed 100 chf. The service was with a smile , beer was served at the right temperature , the naan and the samosa were ok. However the quality of lamb in the lamb Roganjosh was terrible , the sauce was tomato purée paste with a lot of cream . Totally devoid of taste . The tandoori chicken was dry and colored red . No hint of tandoori spices . However I must say that it seems to be a popular place with a mix of Indian and local guests . This is despite the food being way below standard which was very surprising. Probably because the service is good (???) It’s sad that the locals are given this food which is masquerading as Indian food . Hope the owners take this review seriously and take care to improve the food quality and give a taste of real Indian food experience to its guests .

My husband and me were last weekend at this restaurant and we were very impressed! This was an experience not just a meal! The food and special drinks were well prepared and presented. The staff is fantastic!! Friendly and attentive servers.

We visited the restaurant with our kids (11+14) who love Indian food. While the service was excellent, the food was average. Especially spices were somewhat missing in some dishes, actually two main dishes tasted boring. Meat quality was also below what we experienced in other Indian restaurants
Tried butter naan and dal makhni..loved the food..very tasty n just like delhi. Portion size is good for two people..masala lemon was tasty..recommended for indian food
Very good food and service. One of our colleagues was visiting Switzerland first time, so we were servered with complementary dessert !!

I came to eat in the Tamarind Hill with 3 friends, one of them a lover of Indian food who also suggested this place. I like Indian food, but I rarely go out to eat it at restaurants. Still, this place had very good options and the food was very tasty. I think all of us very happy with the sizes + the quality of the food ordered.

I’ve found this Indian restaurant by chance and wasn’t disappointed at all.I’ve been to Indian restaurants all over the world and this one gets you closer to the motherland as possible.Large variety of dishes, helpful staff, generous portions and interesting tastes.Prices are not cheap but not different than other places in Zurich.Will definitely return here again

Went for a spontanious dinner to tamarind hill.Got seated within seconds without a reservation(although i would recommend to make one in future)Our waitress(i think she was also the owner) was super friendly, knew everything about the dishes. We ve got one complimenty sparkling wine since it was mothersday.Menu looked fine. I am not experienced with indian food but for me it seemed to be a great variety. We chose the mixed platter for 2 pax as starter - which was gorgeous.Havent been able to finish our 2 main courses due to the amount of food served.Another comp. dessert for all the ladies was a very nice topping.Wine list is pretty small. But it did its job.Only 2 minor negative aspects:A)First water we ordered was bottled water for one person. After i ordered another big bottle we got a caraffe instead of bottled water but priced the same as bottled. Suggest to either poor in the bottled water in front of the guests or in case it is tab water just charge it a bit less than the bottled one.B) coming from hospitalty it breaks my heart to see all this great food served on cracked plates. Almost every second plate had a small crack (i know this is a real high level complaining)Overall it was a very great evening with welcomig staff (which is in my opinion the most important) and excellent food.Would recommend it to friends and familyService 9/10Food 9/10Ambiente 8/10

One of the best Thali's i have ever had in any European country i visited. Amazing taste, Great presentation and finger licking good food. Better than most of the High-end Indian restaurants. If you are in Zurich and search of an Indian food, you cant miss this. !! Thanks for the hospitality !! Had a great time!!

Auf der Suche nach einem indischen Restaurant sind wir durch Tripadviser auf dieses Restaurant gestossen.Das Tamarind ist vom züricher HB mit der S14 lediglich 15 Minuten entfernt. An der Haltestelle angekommen läuft man noch ca. 150m und steht dann unmittelbar im Eingangsbereich. Vor dem Lokal befinden sich ein paar Parkplätze. Der schmale Aussenbereich ist schön gemacht und bietet Platz für ca. 16 Gäste.Die Bedinungen sind von der ersten bis zur letzten Minute sehr sehr freundlich und beraten einen auch gerne bei der Essenswahl :)Dank der hervorrangenden Beratung haben wir uns für das Chicken Chettinad und Korm entschieden, dazu haben wir noch Reis und Naan bestellt (dies muss extra bestellt werden).Was soll ich sagen?! Das Essen war ein Traum. Optisch und geschmacklich hat der Koch alles richtig gemacht. Für einen Nachtisch hatten wir leider keinen Platz mehr... Diesen gibt es aber garantiert beim nächsten Mal :)Die Entscheidung das Tamarind auszuprobieren war absolut richtig und ich kann das Lokal nur jedem empfehlen der gerne indisch isst oder offen für was neues ist.
The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The food was a 10 out of 10!! If you like Indian food, this is the best place to eat!!!
Everything was enjoyable: the food, atmosphere and service as well as chairs. I'm happy to come back.
Very nice place. Great selection on the menu. We choose a mixed platter to share as a starter and we each had a main course. Portions very generous and quality very high! We will be back!
our first time at tge restaurant authentic food and great service was extremely busy so highly recommend to book
I loved the thali and the butter chicken It was our first time and we will be back soon again with more friends .love the ambience
We ordered the Thali when we visited this restaurant last Monday evening. The food however turned out to be very spicy. We could never enjoy the food. Will not visit again.
one of the best indian thalis i have ever eaten.loved the new look of the place . once again a great night
Amazing food beautifully presented and top class service Beautiful ambience and great host Will be back soon

Wir waren zum ersten Mal in diesem wunderbaren Restaurant und sind begeistert. Vom sehr freundlichen Service, über ausgezeichnetes Essen und liebevoll dekorierten Drinks bis hin zu den sehr schönen Kleidern des Personals sowie der Einrichtung... es hat einfach alles mehr als überzeugt. Wir kommen wieder.

Great place to taste indian tasty home made food. Super service. Beautiful decoration. Very good food quality. Starter, main course and deserts all are yummy. Again we will reserve for group table very soon🤗🤗🤗

Ich esse sehr gerne immer wieder in diesem Restaurant und habe bereits alle Mittagsmenues ausprobiert.Anstatt Naan / Papadum (welche Weizenmehl enthalten) kann man eine grössere Portion Reis bekommen.Die Preise fürs Mittagsmenue sind 18.90 (vegetarisch), mit kleinem Aufpreis für Paneer / Poulet / Fleisch

We loved everything about our visit to Tamarind. Everything we ate was delicious. The service was very quick and very friendly. They have really changed the interior design from the Irish Pub the place used to be to fit the experience. We will definitely come back.

Locale caratteristico che offre una buona scelta di specialita' della cucina indiana, molto ben cucinate e presentate. Servizio gentile ed efficiente. Porzioni abbondanti e prezzi corretti (siamo pur sempre a Zurigo). Merita senz'altro una visita.
Felt extremely welcome from the start. Very friendly service, helpful explanations of menu. Food delicious . Can highly recommend. The samosas were to die for!!!

Sehr authentische Küche mit ausgezeichnetem Personal. Essen war sehr gut, Gerichte nicht so, wie man sie aus den meisten indischen Restaurants kennt. Viel liebe zum Detail bei der Anrichtung von Getränken und Speisen, wie auch der Ausstattung des Restaurants.

We really loved that place. When we entered the restaurant, there was this typical Indian smell, not only of food but also insence sticks. We really liked that. They were playing Indian music and not radio music (like we experienced in other Indian restaurants) and the waiters were dressed in a nice traditional outfit. Service was excellent (althoug not german speaking but that was no problem for us) and the food was great! Portions not too big, not too small and also the right amount of spiceyness. We will defenetly come back!

I visited this restaurant twice during my recent trips to Zurich. I tried a couple of other Indian restaurants, but nothing compares to the food and service at Tamarind Hill! Ask for Saira - she was attentive, friendly, and genuine. Best customer service! Will definitely be eating here again next time I’m in Zurich.

I really love indian Food and have been to several other restaurant's...Tamarind Hill is the best and not only because of the food - the service & atmosphere is so great! I enjoy every single visit and will always come back!!! Love you guys!!!
Best indian food ever. Everything was perfect. Nice ambiance and service and good quality food......
We have been travelling for quiet some time in Europe and we happened to accidentally come to this place.... Amazing food and great host. I definitely could say one the best Indian restaurant so far
food - excellent ambiance - excellent service - simply the best not to be missed if you are in zurich had a great night !!!!

we went back after having a great time during our last visit !!!being indian i can vouch on the authenticity of the food but to top that i think they offer a really proffesional and friendly service !!!the staff were dressed so well that it transported me back to india!!!

Sehr leckeres Essen, top Bedienung! Die Einrichtung ist wunderschön. Einzig dass das Personal nur Englisch spricht, hat mich etwas verwundert.Der eher hohe Preis für's Essen ist absolut gerechtfertigt!Als das Servicepersonal mitbekommen hat, dass wir meinen Geburtstag feiern, beschallten sie das Lokal mit dem entsprechenden Song und servierten einen riesigen Teller mit Dessert-Häppchen für alle (inkl. Wunderkerze).Werde bestimmt nicht das letzte Mal dort gewesen sein!

Thali is great and can say quiet big for one person to finish all. Food taste was good and the masalas were used in right proportion. Felt good after finishing what I could. Little pricey for single but not a miss for people visiting Zurich.

After a 12 days long stay in e7rope, just before leaving to back home, craving for Indian food, wrong decision in the end, but went to this place, disappointing a bit, may be due to over rated reviews, if it wasn’t for that, may be we wouldn’t have been so disappointed. Have been to other place Malabar , where we couldn’t get booking, is much better.Willl be injustice not add that good atmosphere for Swiss people, may be not so great for Indian travellers, because too much Indian was in the decor and staff attire, tandoori roti and naan are pretty authentic , very few Indian restaurants have real tandoor, this one has, so tandoori stuff is good...can try....
The food was very good. We enjoyed a sampling of chicken and vegetarian dishes. Each was better than the previous. Definitely recommend a visit if in the area.

Das Tamarind Hill ist schon seit längerem sehr gut und hält sein exzellentes Niveau: Qualität der Speisen, Zubereitung, grosse Portionen. Aufmerksame, freundliche und professionelle Bedieung, aber kein Schicki Micki. Das internationale Flair verlangt vom Gast manchmal ein paar Brocken Englisch. Darüber kann man geteilter Meinung sein, es ist auf jeden Fall autenthisch und wie gesagt freundlich.Ein weiteres nettes Detail sind die Gästeparkplätze direkt vor dem Haus.Am Wochenende unbedingt reservieren, es ist sehr beliebt!Danke Tamarind Hill Team - ich komme immer wieder sehr gerne

Sono stato ieri sera con la famiglia e sono rimasto piacevolmente soddisfatto. Il pollo tandouri di mia figlia buono è molto tenero. Antipasti ottimi, e curry saporiti. Unica eccezione il pesce cotto al tandouri forse un po’ troppo asciutto e salato, ma il cuoco ha prontamente dato una spiegazione e offerto un nuovo piatto in sostituzione. I tempi di attesa tra gli antipasti e le portate un po’ lunghi, forse perché il ristorante pieno ed era sabato. In alternativa c’era il buffet indiano. Sicuramente torneremo se ci sarà un’altra occasione.
Unglaublich feines Essen! Wir waren begeistert von der supper Bedienung und den authentischen Kleidern und Einrichtung! Die Portionen sind sehr gross.
Excellent food ! Authentic food . Must try butter chicken and dal tarka . Excellent hosts and greats place to have indian outside the country ! U don't miss Indian food after visiting Tamarind
Das Restaurant und das Personal sind sehr authentisch und das Essen sehr gut. Das Personal ist freundlich und der Service gut.

Gute Bedienung und sehr schön gekleidetes Personal. Essen war gut und grosse Portionen wurden serviert. Konnten leider nicht alles essen. Auch eine kleine Geburtstagsüberraschung wurde serviert ohne spezielle Aufforderung. Nur der schlechte Bass der Lautsprecher hat den Zauber der guten indischen Abendmusik gestört.
Seeeehr feines Indisches Essen. Wunderschön angerichtet und suuuuper aufmerksame Bedienung. Sehr schönes Restaurant 😍😍

We came to Tamarind Hill for dinner. The staff is really nice although the dresses of the waitresses were kind of irritating. Food was ok. It's not bad at all but I've had better Indian food before. Maybe we will give it a second try later on.

I was at the Tamarind for the fourth time, it is always the first choice when scheduling a dinner with friends. The place is always booked and highly frequented by Indian eaters. This time I had Lamb Khadai which was great. My friend ordered a Korm which unfortunately was nearly tasteless. All dishes came hot to the table and the beverage service was good as well. We will definitely come again
Loved the lamb vindoloo and excellent service .if u love Indian ,this is the place for u.... Excellent
Good food must visit if in zurich. Service is excellent and reasonably priced food. The bartender Sukhi was very welcoming and a super host.

Top Service und ausgezeichnete Gerichte ob mit Fleisch, Huhn oder vegan alles war extrem gut. Die Schärfe der Gerichte ist in meinen Augen dem europäischen Gaumen angepasst. Der ganzen Familie hat es geschmeckt - Wir kommen wieder!

we came to this place by google maps & trust me it is a nice place to visit for indian meal especially if you are vegeterian we even got Masala Papad which was unexpected :) hope this is more than enough to describe a resturant which serves indian cusine

If you want the best Indian food in Zurich just rembember Tamrind Hill. Food is just awesome, service really nice. Lamb rogan josh was such that its difficult to her such in India itself which tells the quality in itself.
Time again and again ... never fails to disappoint.... amazing food and service .5 stars for everything ... See u soon again

Definitely the best !!! Awesome decor , very classy and great selection of background music, very delicious food and attentive service Must try the tak a tak and the pistachio kulfi !!! Excellent overall

Amazing Indian food, i’ve been twice in India and it is hard to find a restaurant in Europe/ Switzerland that is authentic, and not adapted to us europeans. If you want some real Indian cuisine that is the place to go. It is a little pricy but worth it, and they have a verry friendly staff ( English speaking). See you soon.

We were a group of 8 celebrating my birthday!!! Wow ..they did make my day special We all had Thalis and the food was delicious.perfect balance of spices .must compliment Saira for looking after us so well

I have been there with my girlfriend for Valentine's Day. The atmosphere in the restaurant was very special, we really enjoyed the food and also the service has been very kind. The dessert was particularly amazing, but we really liked everything.

Wow wow wow Beautifully decorated for the occasion Rose petals everywhere... balloons with ribbons all throughout the ceiling and amazing valentine special thali Really enjoyed the evening and I must say excellent service
Super faines Essen, sehr aufmerksame Bedienung, die Damen tragen Saares ! Parkplätze vor der Haustüre ! Like like like !
The quality of the food is so good. The staff are so friendly. The packing for take away orders are done very well.

Mein Mann und ich haben das Restaurant schon vom vorbeifahren gekannt und es hat uns sehr Interessiert wie es ist. Das Restaurant ist Wunderschön eingerichtet man wird auch sehr Freundlich empfangen. Das Personal ist sehr Freundlich und die Gerichte sind Lecker und es sind auch gute Portionen. Dieses Restaurant kann man wirklich weiter empfehlen jedoch muss man bedenken das es etwas Teurer ist und das Grosse Portemonnaie mitnehmen sollte.

Nous avons partagé un très bon repas en couple. Le restaurant était plein mais le service a relativement bien suivi et les plats étaient savoureux bien qu'un peu trop salé peut-être. La carte est bien faite. A recommander pour toutes personnes séjournant dans le quartier d'Oerlikon ou pour les amateurs de cuisine indienne en particulier.
Great new decoration!!! Authentic place!!! Best food!!! Price Value top!!! Parking in front of restaurant and very friendly staff!!! I always come back!!!
Very good indian restaurant. El cordero Roganrosh y el arroz con azafrán son muy sabrosos. Servicio muy atento.
